BIBIM NAENGMYEON

Bibim naengmyeon is a Korean dish made of cold noodles, vegetables, and meat in a spicy sauce.

1-2 servings 20 minutes
THIS IS AN ADVERT

Equipment

  • Pot
  • Knife
  • Cutting board
  • Bowl

Ingredients

  • Cold noodles
  • Cucumber
  • Radish
  • Egg
  • Beef
  • Spicy sauce

Directions

  1. Cook the noodles according to package instructions.
  2. Slice the cucumber, radish, and egg into thin strips.
  3. Mix the noodles with the cucumber, radish, egg, and beef.
  4. Pour the sauce over the noodles and mix everything together.
  5. Serve cold.
